newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barges quoted higher on call session.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barges quoted higher on call session.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were quoted higher Monday on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session. Four barges traded versus none Friday.
- Four barges traded, one each week of January, Mississippi (Memphis through Cairo), at 100 percent of tariff-no comparison.
- Two barges, Mississippi (Henderson), this week, bid 115 percent, up five percentage points, no offer.
- Two barges, next week, Mississippi (St Louis), bid 102-1/2 percent - up 2-1/2 points from similar bid, no offer.
- Two barges, next week, Illinois, bid 160 percent - up 20 points from bid, offered 175 - up 25 points from offer.
- Four barges, one each week of January, Illinois, bid 180 percent, offered 215 - no comparison on either value.
- Eight barges, two each week of January, lower Ohio, bid 115 percent, offered 125 - no comparison on either value.
- Five barges, 30-day open, mid-Mississippi, bid 162-1/2 percent - up 2-1/2 from similar bid, no offer.
